section.p: You strike up a conversation with a dwarf who is going in the same direction. He works as a jester in the wintertime, usually spending a month at each castle he visits. ‘My jokes and tricks mean I am much in demand.’
‘Alas, no one has time for feasts when the weather is fine.’ His friendly wit inspires you. , and if you get higher than your CHARISMA score then add 1 to it. Then .
